title: Thailand Inventor’s Day 2020
description: Thailand recognized February 2nd as the Inventors’ Day, one of the biggest invention and innovation events in Thailand with more than 1,000 inventions and innovations, which is annually held from February 2nd to 6th and hosted by National Research Council of Thailand (NRCT). This is an excellent opportunity for all Thai and international researchers, inventors, innovators also every visitor to discuss and share the ideas and experiences in the global structure.
start_date: 2 กุมภาพันธ์ 2563
end_date: 6 กุมภาพันธ์ 2563
ticket: ไม่มีค่าเข้าชม
